text:
QUBIT | LONDON | ONSITE | DATA SCIENTIST | VISA SPONSORSHIP AND RELOCATION COSTS PROVIDED

We are looking for a strong Data Scientist looking for a challenging role conducting pure research into online consumer behaviour. Experience with large scale data sets and Machine Learning techniques is essential as well as a strong mathematical/statistical background. We will consider visa sponsorship for the right candidate.

More details here - https://boards.greenhouse.io/qubit/jobs/743687?gh_jid=743687...

Please send your resume direct to careers@qubit.com
